# About this item

- Bamboo Knife Block: The Cook N Home knife block is made of natural bamboo and has 20 slots; it is durable and visually appealing, with a slot size of 2.2 cm
- Wider 20 Slots: The knife holder features 20 wide slots, accommodating most commonly used knives and accessories, with slots deep enough to hold knives up to 9 inches
- Universal Knife Holder: Natural bamboo knife storage with slots of various sizes accommodates chef’s knives, steak knives, long knives, and a cleaver
- Widely Useful: The versatile countertop butcher block holds various items, including kitchen scissors, sharpening steel, and other accessories, helping to keep your kitchen organized
- Dimensions: The knife block measures 10.8 inches (length), 9.2 inches (height), and 4.8 inches (width); keep the block dry and ensure knives are completely dried before placing them inside

## Product Description

The Cook N Home Bamboo knife storage block, 20 Slot is made of natural Bamboo that is durable and looks great. Holds most commonly used knives and accessories up to 9 inches deep. 19 Slot widths range from 3/4 to 3 1/4 inches and holds chef’s, steak, wide and long knives, and a cleaver. Wider slots can hold a kitchen scissor, sharpening steel, and other items. Angled slot to grab knives easily. Rubber feet prevents block from slipping. Dimensions are 10. 2 in. Length, 9. 2 in. Height, and 4. 8 in. Width. Wipe with cloth to clean.

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

Additionally, they appreciate its functionality, noting it works well with knives of all makes, and consider it excellent value for money.

##### [_5.0 out of 5 stars_ Good knife block at a very reasonable price](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R1PXWXQBDPRPSC/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8)



Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023

Color: Acacia WoodSize: 20 Slots [Verified Purchase](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G8UYX7LALQC8V9KA)






I'd recently bought us some new Shun knives, and it seemed time for a knife block upgrade. Our old one was one of those without slots (it has plastic filaments that let you place any number of knives), and it had gotten twisted internally over the years, so it needed to go.



With the new knives, I wanted something that would fit a variety of sizes and that was solid enough to hold up to the occasional grazes from extremely sharp blades, as we tend to get very high quality knives that hold quite an edge. This block turned out to be a great choice. It's made of acacia, a very hard wood, and my concerns over its durability seem misplaced. It's holding up very well after a couple of months of use. Will it look pristine years from now? Time will tell, but I'd bet yes, as it still looks like new and gets a lot of use.



It has slots for a variety of knives, a pair of scissors, a sharpening rod, and eight steak knives. With a price just under $30, it's a great buy!

##### [_5.0 out of 5 stars_ A very nice solid wood product that holds a ton of knives!](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/RIOLZM8AJVOIZ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8)



Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2015

Color: BambooSize: 20 Slots [Verified Purchase](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G8UYX7LALQC8V9KA)






This product is made from 100% real Bamboo. Even though I read through the negative reviews from people who have no idea what they are talking about I decided to buy one.



Bamboo grows as a hollow round tube. It is sliced into slats that are approximately 1/8" wide and can be as long as the Bamboo stalk is (generally about 12").



Once you have a stack of these slats they are then glued together to make boards, planks or in this case a block. Bamboo can be glued together either vertically or horizontally each of these two techniques will give the end product a completely different look. (Vertical grained glue ups have very little grain and present a very linear appearance, meanwhile Horizontal glue ups show much more grain and that little Bamboo detail (little ziggly lines) that we all recognize as bamboo).



This particular product is made by gluing the Bamboo vertically. You can clearly see this in the product as it appears to be made up of tiny strips. Some people are mistakenly stating that the product is made from veneer. This is false as veneer is paper thin sheets of wood. Hardwood trees can be cut into boards or planks as they are solid inside. The cutting mill simply decides what cuts are the most efficient (get the most linear feet out of that particular tree) and then a trunk is milled or re-sawed to make the boards. This of course can n ot be done with Bamboo as it is once again hollow in the middle.



So let's look at the actual product.



Size



9" at the tallest point

10" long (across the bottom)

4 7/8" wide



Slots



3.5" at the top of unit

2x 2" wide on left

2x 1 1/2" on the right

1 1/2" on left

1 1/4" on the right

2x 1" towards the bottom

1 1/4" by 1/2" slot for scissors

8x steak knife slots are approx. 7/8" wide



All slots go all the way through the block and are open at the bottom.



Workmanship



Very good overall, I did notice that a few slots have some rough spots where the slot was machined but they did not take the time to sand it down properly. Not a big deal does not effect its ability to hold knives.



Overall



I am giving the product 5 stars. The main reason is value. A solid wood block that is well built and costs under $20!



Yes better blocks are available but cost much more. As a side note to those people who complain that their knives don't fit, that's not the blocks fault, it's theirs for not measuring before buying. This for me was a very good purchase at a ridiculously great deal. (Under $20 with Prime shipping).

##### [_4.0 out of 5 stars_ Good for the price](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R1T12CW9WVTDHH/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8)



Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020

Color: BambooSize: 20 Slots [Verified Purchase](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=G8UYX7LALQC8V9KA)






1.) Overall Quality: It’s not the highest quality, but it looks decent and does the job.

2.) Condition Upon Arrival: It arrived with a long scratch on one side, but seeing as things in my kitchen tend to get a little beat up, it wasn’t worth returning just for that. It also had some places where there were machining chips still clinging onto the knife block, but again that wasn’t something worth returning it for.

3.) Function: It fits my set of knives nicely, and it’s heavy enough to offset their handle weights. I have a set of Berghoff knives that have some pretty hefty and heavy handles (though they have great balance). I was previously using two universal knife blocks, the universal kind with the plastic fibers to fit any shape or size knives, but they kept tipping over because of the combined handle weight of my knives. This knife block isn’t even close to tipping over, there’s plenty of room for all my knives (I could even put all my steak knives in if I rearranged it some more), and it looks nice, scratch and all.

4.) Final verdict: it’s not super fancy, damage-free, or compact. But for the price it is sturdy, holds a lot of different sized knives, is heavy enough to counterbalance heavy handles knives, and it still has a nice appearance. Worth the price, although it may arrive with some damage.

# Product Summary: Cook N Home Bamboo Knife Storage Block without Knives, 20 Slots Universal Knife Holder Countertop Butcher Block Knife Stand for Easy Kitchen Storage

From Cook N Home

4.6 out of 5 stars, 6,877 ratings

[Customer reviews](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DHH0LRA?ref=dp_product_quick_view#customer-reviews_feature_div)

100+ bought in past week

## Price

One-time purchase: $26.99

[Purchasing options](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DHH0LRA?ref=dp_product_quick_view#buybox)

[Other sellers](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DHH0LRA?ref=dp_product_quick_view#dynamic-aod-ingress-box)

[Other sellers](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DHH0LRA?ref=dp_product_quick_view#unqualifiedBuyBox)

## About this Item

- Bamboo Knife Block: The Cook N Home knife block is made of natural bamboo and has 20 slots; it is durable and visually appealing, with a slot size of 2.2 cm
- Wider 20 Slots: The knife holder features 20 wide slots, accommodating most commonly used knives and accessories, with slots deep enough to hold knives up to 9 inches
- Universal Knife Holder: Natural bamboo knife storage with slots of various sizes accommodates chef’s knives, steak knives, long knives, and a cleaver
- Widely Useful: The versatile countertop butcher block holds various items, including kitchen scissors, sharpening steel, and other accessories, helping to keep your kitchen organized
- Dimensions: The knife block measures 10.8 inches (length), 9.2 inches (height), and 4.8 inches (width); keep the block dry and ensure knives are completely dried before placing them inside

## Product Description

The Cook N Home Bamboo knife storage block, 20 Slot is made of natural Bamboo that is durable and looks great. Holds most commonly used knives and accessories up to 9 inches deep. 19 Slot widths range from 3/4 to 3 1/4 inches and holds chef’s, steak, wide and long knives, and a cleaver. Wider slots can hold a kitchen scissor, sharpening steel, and other items. Angled slot to grab knives easily. Rubber feet prevents block from slipping. Dimensions are 10. 2 in. Length, 9. 2 in. Height, and 4. 8 in. Width. Wipe with cloth to clean.

## Options Available

### Color

- Acacia Wood
- Bamboo

### Size

- 20 Slots
- 25 Slots
- Universal Bamboo

How customer reviews and ratings work

Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.
